Package org.knime.core.webui.node.dialog.defaultdialog.widget

Interface UpdateHandler<R,S>

Type Parameters:
R - the return type of the update method. This is the information that is transmitted to the frontend on an update, i.e. its shape depends on what this update handler is used for there.
S - the settings, the targeted setting depends on (see DependencyHandler).
All Superinterfaces:
DependencyHandler<S>
All Known Subinterfaces:
ButtonUpdateHandler<R,S,M>, ChoicesUpdateHandler<S>
All Known Implementing Classes:
CancelableActionHandler.UpdateHandler, DomainChoicesUpdateHandler, NoopButtonUpdateHandler, NoopChoicesUpdateHandler
public interface UpdateHandler<R,S> extends DependencyHandler<S>
This interface is used for defining any kind of update of settings values or context information (e.g. possible values in a ChoicesWidget whenever one setting depends on at least one other setting. The update handler is linked to the target of such a dependency by annotations.
Author:
Paul BÃ¤rnreuther

  • Method Details

    • update

      R update(S settings, DefaultNodeSettings.DefaultNodeSettingsContext context) throws WidgetHandlerException
      This method is called when one of the dependency settings defined by S changes in order to determine the immediate effect.
      Parameters:
      settings - the dependency settings on update
      context - the current DefaultNodeSettings.DefaultNodeSettingsContext
      Returns:
      result defining state changes in the fronted.
      Throws:
      WidgetHandlerException - if the request should fail providing the error message to the frontend
